definitions: relating to or characteristic of a small group of people having religious beliefs regarded by others as strange or as imposing excessive control over members
shortDefinitions: relating to or characteristic of religious cult

definitions: characterized by a misplaced or excessive admiration for a particular thing

examples.text: the cultish adoration of certain traditional writers
the crowd's cultish worship seemed out of sync with the performance

shortDefinitions: characterized by excessive admiration for particular thing

definitions: relating to a person or thing that is popular or fashionable among a particular group or section of society

examples.text: a popular band with a cultish following

shortDefinitions: relating to person or thing that is popular among particular group
